response.explain: The task is to mine 1 oak_log and craft 1 oak_planks and 1 stick. The bot's current inventory includes an iron_pickaxe. The bot can perceive an oak_log in pic1 at a distance of 11.77 and 11.98.
response.subtask:
1) Perceive and teleport near the oak_log.
2) Mine the oak_log.
3) ...
